<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Header -->
# Core.Review
> Customer Feedback & Reputation
<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Overview -->
## Overview

This module manages **Customer Reviews**.
It allows the system to send emails requesting feedback and store the resulting ratings.
It integrates with **ReviewPush** to sync reviews from external platforms (Google, Yelp, etc.).

### Key Features
-   **Solicitation**: Sending "How did we do?" emails.
-   **Aggregation**: Viewing average ratings per Franchisee.

<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->
